!Fishermen's Guild Member: In the Floran Agricultural Area, if you hunt *plain watchmen, rough hewn rock golems, Delu Lizardman suppliers, Delu Lizardman special agents, cursed seers, Delu Lizardman commanders, or Delu Lizardman shamans*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
